entry.title: blah
entry.content:
```ruby

–– encoding : utf-8 ––

module EnrollmentService class EnrollmentBulkMapper < BulkMapper

def initialize
  columns = [:user_id, :subject_id, :role]
  options = { validate: false, on_duplicate_key_update: [:role] }

  super Enrollment, columns, options
end

end end ```
